name: Bunny Triggered
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Amber, equip this card.
After Amber equips this card, immediately use Explosive Puppet once.
After you use a Normal Attack: If this card and Baron Bunny are still on the field, then Baron Bunny explodes and deals 3 Pyro DMG.
(You must have Amber in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1304]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1304] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S13042]</color> once.
After you use a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>: If this card and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113041]</color> are still on the field, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113041]</color> explodes and deals 3 $[K103].
(You must have $[A1304] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Amber</color>, equip this card.
After Amber equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Puppet</color> once.
After you use a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>: If this card and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Baron Bunny</color> are still on the field, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>Baron Bunny</color> explodes and deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>.
(You must have Amber in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Amber to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
